name: CNC Cutting
description: Effective both for 2D and 3D model making in versatile materials - wood, composite, metal and styrofoam.

name: Laser Cutting
description: For precision 2D profile cutting, template and decoration items.

name: 3D Printing
description: Rapid prototyping and customized product development made easy with additive manufacturing.

name: Plasma Cutting
description: Quick and simple way to cut any metal that conducts electricity such as steel, stainless steel, aluminium, copper, brass and other conductive metals.
